label: K-Breathe
description: Displays live breathing data from the Tymewear VitalPro sensor on your Karoo. Includes VE, breathing rate, tidal volume, mobilization index, VE graph, and time-in-zones fields with FIT recording.
releaseNotes: Add 8-breath rolling average smoothing to BR and TV display. Reduces noise by ~33x to match Tymewear app. VE zones and MI now use smoothed values for stable transitions. FIT recording unchanged.
